column5: Looking for reasonably priced buck tail jigs. Suggestions?

Hello, My Great uncle used to be my source. He decided at 90 he was done making us all bucktails so we had to find a new source. Here is what I am using now. Fleet Farm - This is one color they carry like 5 colors. Jiggs World Bucktailshttp://www.fleetfarm.com/detail/Jigg...Fcdefgodx5wAsw Hope the link works for you. If not do a search on Fleet Farm and Bucktails should come up for you. Brett

I started out using Thompson Dollfly(maribou) and graduated to Upperman Bucktails.This probably dates me.Now I tie my own.I don't use bucktails much anymore.I usually end up with a jighead and some kind of plastic.Bill
Have a look at , baitrigs.com, tony and joe Puccini make some great tackle, based out of madison, wi. Best quality jigs around .
